item.title: 27 березня. Цей день в історії (ArmyInform)
Ukrainian military had 50 combat engagements with Russian forces near Bilohorivka of Luhansk region, Terny, Yampolivka, and n... (LiveUAMap)
item.description: Ukrainian military had 50 combat engagements with Russian forces near Bilohorivka of Luhansk region, Terny, Yampolivka, and north to Vesele of Donetsk region, Ivanivske, Bohdanivka, Klischiyivka of Donetsk region, Berdychi, Semenivka and Pervomayske of Donetsk region, Novomykhaylivka, Staromayorske of Donetsk region, Robotyne and north-west Verbove of Zaporizhzhia region, Krynky of Kherson region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report

item.title: At Novopavlivka direction Russian army shelled Krasnohorivka, Heorhiyivka, Paraskoviyivka, Kostyantynivka of Donetsk region. ... (LiveUAMap)
item.description: At Novopavlivka direction Russian army shelled Krasnohorivka, Heorhiyivka, Paraskoviyivka, Kostyantynivka of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrikes at Krasnohorivka and Oleksandrivka of Donetsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report

item.description: At Kherson direction Russian army shelled Solonchaky, Ivanivka and Tyahynka of Kherson region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
